page.title: 20TRAVEL
page.content: IN LAVERSTOKE, PORTALS,THE MAIN EMPLOYER IN THE AREA RUN THEIR OWN BUS SERVICE FOR THE WORKERS ACCORDING TO THE SHIFTS.THERE ARE THREE SHIFTS IN ONE DAY-DAY SHIFT,AFTERNOON SHIFT AND NIGHT SHIFT.THERE IS A PUBLIC BUS SERVICE FROM OVERTON POST OFFICE TO LAVERSTOKE MILL TO ANDOVER:IT PROVIDES ADEQUATE SERVICE THROUGHOUT THE DAY.THERE ARE FOUR BUS STOPS IN LAVERSTOKE TWO GO ONE WAY AND TWO GO THE OTHER.OVERTON STANDS ON THE MAIN LONDON/EXETER RAILWAY LINE.THE CONVENIENCE TO LONDON ENABLES MANY PEOPLE TO COMMUTE TO THE CITY DAILY AND AT THE SAME TIME TO LIVE IN A VERY PLEASENT RURAL ENVIRONMENT.INSPITE OF THE GOOD SERVICE IT IS VERY CONVENIENT TO HAVE YOUR OWN PRIVATE TRANSPORT LIKE CAR,MOTORBIKE,ETC.
